Description.Text: Marinem Hotel is a classic 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Istanbul. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, an onsite Turkish restaurant and an excellent location close to the Beyazit Tower. The area surrounding Beyazit Square and the Grand Bazaar is densely populated and contains a huge amount of historic buildings dating from throughout the city's eventful past. Nearby places of interest include early 16th-century Bayezid II Mosque, ruins of the Roman Forum of Theodosius, 19th-century Beyazit Tower, 4th-century Valens Aqueduct and the old sea walls along the Sea of Marmara. Aksaray tram stop is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Istanbul destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are classic and comfortably furnished featuring wood furniture. Amenities include air-conditioning, satellite TV, a mini-bar and an en-suite bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. The hotel restaurant offers Turkish cuisine in a relaxing and comfortable setting. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the social hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
